title: Uniswap fires employee responsible for a $25k worth rug pull scam
description: The leading decentralized exchange, Uniswap found itself embroiled in a controversy that has rather surprised the crypto community. A developer associated with the exchange faced serious allegations of misconduct related to a memecoin project. The individual, known in the crypto community as AzFlin, has been accused of manipulating a memecoin project, leading to significant financial ... Read more
